name: Fabric Loader
description: You can use Fabric Loader, but DO NOT USE Fabric API!

name: Legacy Fabric Loader
description: You can use Fabric Loader, but DO NOT USE Fabric API!

name: OptiFine
description: Check the Optifine rules

name: OptiFabric
description: Can be used to run OptiFine on the Fabric Loader Note! Optifine should be included in your [mods] folder.

name: Sodium
description: Modern rendering engine and client-side optimization mod for Minecraft

name: Starlight
description: Rewrites the light engine to fix lighting performance and lighting errors

name: Phosphor
description: Improve the performance of Minecraft's lighting engine while fixing many bugs

name: Lithium
description: No-compromises game logic/server optimization mod

name: Krypton
description: Optimizes the Minecraft networking stack and entity tracker. Note! It could be cause issues for some macros.

name: Dynamic FPS
description: Improve performance when Minecraft is in the background

name: SpeedRunIGT
description: In-game Timer for Minecraft Speedrun

name: Atum
description: Automatically reset random and set seeds

name: Fast Reset
description: Skip saving the world when leaving the world to faster reset.

name: Anchiale
description: Skip saving the world when leaving the world to faster reset but for Pre 1.9

name: WorldPreview
description: Draws a preview of the world on the loading screen during chunk generation.

name: LazyDFU
description: Makes the initialization of DataFixerUpper "lazy", making the game start more quickly

name: Voyager
description: Fixes a rare CME (ConcurrentModificationException) when using java 11+

name: Force Port
description: A fabric mod which forces the port of the "open to lan" feature to be 25565.

name: TabFocus
description: Implement button focus by press tab feature in Pre-1.14

name: FabricProxy-Lite
description: Support forward player data from "Velocity" proxy

name: LazyStronghold
description: Generates stronghold locations on a seperate thread to speed up world generation

name: BiomeThreadLocalFix
description: Fix Biome ThreadLocal Memory leak issue

name: LegacyPlanarFog
description: Make terrain fog rendering to planar

name: StatsPerWorld
description: Separation of achievements and statistics per world in Minecraft Pre-1.7

name: SleepBackground
description: Improve performance when Minecraft is in the background with config

name: antiresourcereload
description: Caches datapack and server resources to make world creation faster

name: antigone
description: Fixes a rare server thread crash involving an interaction with striders and chicken jockeys. This will remove most/all causes of the infamous 'ghost nether'/'phantom nether'.

name: Chunkumulator
description: Optimizes chunk sending for worse quality connections to the server, allowing them to start playing as soon as they join.

name: StandardSettings
description: Defaults settings to a standard set by the player when creating a new World for macros Note! If you are using this mod for the first time, please read the README before use it.

name: extra-options
description: Adds the 1.17 options of a monochrome logo, reduced distortion effects and reduced fov effects

name: set-spawn-mod
description: Set your spawnpoint to specified coordinates during set seed runs

name: ChunkCacher
description: Caches chunks up to before features stage for set seed
